trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Glasgow
There was one other sighting in Glasgow on or around December 27th 2009
Summary: Approx 10 orange shaped lights appeared sequencly high in the sky and then dissapeared
divs: Sighting DetailsFrom my lounge window I witnessed what firstly appeared to be 2 orange helicopter lights flying over the river clyde towards Skelmorlie North Ayrshire, but more and more of the lights them seemed to appear. Approx 10 lights appeared and did go high into the sky then disappeared. This sighting has been witnessed by many people in the area of Skelmorlie and I called my uncle Mr Frank Jack who has managed to get 2 photographs of the even in question. The lights appeared to be to high in the sky for fireworks or even flares but what was also noted that during the event a small aircraft flew under them as it was heading to land at glasgow airport.
